summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting the redevelopment proposal of Jack D. Mayo, Quimby-Adams, Inc. and D.E. Construction, and Cascade Pacific Development Corporation, and conditionally accepting the redevelopment proposal of Mr. and Mrs. James A. Johnson, to purchase and develop parcels in the Leschi Neighborhood Development Project, Wash. A-2-1; authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to execute and deliver deeds; authorizing the Director of Housing and Neighborhood Development to administer the "Contract for Sale of Land"; designating disposition of such proceeds; and ratifying and confirming prior actions.
